text: Daniele de Paoli (born 8 December 1973) is an Italian former professional racing cyclist. He rode in six editions of the Giro d'Italia. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:People from Pavia Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy
title: Daniele De Paoli
